questions.sentence:
Form the C program to ask for, read in, and print back out one integer, one floating point value, and one character. 
		   Select the Print button once your done.

		   int variable1
		   float  variable2
		   char  variable3


		   PRINT(Enter number:)
		   GET[        ],variable1 
		   

		   PRINT(Enter Float:)
		   [      ] [        ],variable2

		   PRINT(Enter Char)
		   GET[        ],[       ]
